Menu

Meats

We carry a full line of all natural, antibiotic and growth stimulant free beef, pork, buffalo, and Amish raised chickens. Select cuts of lamb, elk, and venison are also available. Our German sausage and jerky are all homemade:

Sausages

Bockwurst, Bratwurst, Knackwurst, Jagdwurst, Schmierwurst, Smoked Polish Sausage, Liver Sausage, Breakfast sausage links, Beer sticks, Summer Sausage

Jerky

Beef, Turkey, Buffalo, and too many flavors to mention

Specialties

We also have a full line of German Specialty items including imported German rye breads delivered fresh, weekly. There are 20+ varities, so there's always something new to try!
